name: nc-vault-env
description: Read and set environmental variables for processes from Vault

scripts.test-ci: set -x && npm update autochecker -q --no-progress && export TMPDIR=$(mktemp -d) && autochecker 5-wheezy 6-wheezy 8-wheezy; e=$?; rm -Rf ${TMPDIR}; exit $e

author: Vladimir Doba <vladimir.doba@namecheap.com>
